title: Handle a Product Recall
description: A supplier has issued a recall for a product due to a safety issue. An agent must notify all retailers who purchased the product.

tasks.description: Receive the recall notice from the supplier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the details of the recall, including the affected product and batch numbers.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all customers who purchased the recalled product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a list of all affected retailers.

tasks.description: Send a recall notification to all affected customers with instructions on how to return the product.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends the recall notices.

tasks.description: Flag the product in the system to prevent any further sales.
tasks.expected_outcome: The product is marked as 'recalled' and cannot be sold.
